## Introduction

This dashboard presents food security data.


```{r}
# Sample R code to visualize food insecurity data
library(ggplot2)
data <- data.frame(
  Category = c("Food Secure", "Moderate Insecurity", "Another Category", "Very Insecure"),
  Value = c(50, 20, 15, 15)
)
ggplot(data, aes(x = Category, y = Value, fill = Category)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity") +
  theme_minimal()
```
